def removeRowAndCol(L, row, col):
    # Your code goes here...
    a=[]
    if(len(L)==1 or len(L)==0 or row==0 or col==0):
        return " Cannot  remove row and col "
    else:
        for j in L:
            del j[col]
        L.pop(row)
        return L
    

# Write your own test cases.
k=removeRowAndCol([ [ 2, 3, 4, 5],
   [ 8, 7, 6, 5],
  [ 0, 1, 2, 3]] ,1,2 )
print(k)
